web_snippets: Elisa Morgan (MDiv) was named by Christianity Today as one of the top fifty ... CEO of MOPS International and now is President Emerita. She speaks ...
For twenty years, Elisa Morgan served as CEO of MOPS International (www.mops.org). Under her leadership MOPS grew from 350 to over 4,000 groups throughout ...
Elisa Morgan is an author, speaker and the former CEO of MOPS International, and she encourages us that we can serve God now, no matter our skills or education.
